mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.MEMO, t1.OWNERID, t1.OWNERTYPE, t1.SUBTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t1.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t1.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USEROBJECTTYPE FROM T_SRFUSEROBJECT t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`OWNERID`, t1.`OWNERTYPE`, t1.`SUBTYPE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDATA`, t1.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USEROBJECTID`, t1.`USEROBJECTLEVEL`, t1.`USEROBJECTNAME`, t1.`USEROBJECTTYPE` FROM `T_SRFUSEROBJECT` t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.MEMO, t1.OWNERID, t1.OWNERTYPE, t1.SUBTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t1.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t1.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USEROBJECTTYPE FROM T_SRFUSEROBJECT t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.MEMO, t1.OWNERID, t1.OWNERTYPE, t1.SUBTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t1.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t1.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USEROBJECTTYPE FROM T_SRFUSEROBJECT t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.MEMO, t1.OWNERID, t1.OWNERTYPE, t1.SUBTYPE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USEROBJECTID, t1.USEROBJECTLEVEL, t1.USEROBJECTNAME, t1.USEROBJECTTYPE FROM T_SRFUSEROBJECT t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ENABLE], t1.[MEMO], t1.[OWNERID], t1.[OWNERTYPE], t1.[SUBTYPE], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERDATA], t1.[USERDATA2], t1.[USEROBJECTID], t1.[USEROBJECTLEVEL], t1.[USEROBJECTNAME], t1.[USEROBJECTTYPE] FROM [T_SRFUSEROBJECT] t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
